component.name: MRA-FET Analysis
component.author: Califano lab (C2B2)
component.description: This component implements Master Regulator Analysis using Fisher's Exact Test. It attempts to identify transcription factors or signalling molecules which control a set of differentially expressed target genes (TGs). The FET is used to evaluate the enrichment of the set of differentially expressed genes and the targets of the regulatory molecules. An ARACNe-style network of regulatory interactions is required.
